author: PsycheVoyage
text:
# How to Schedule a Session with Our Expert Practitioners

## 1. Browse Practitioner Profiles
Visit the [practitioner-profiles](https://discord.com/channels/1211836675563589682/1240448693530792006) channel to learn about our practitioners and choose a practitioner that resonates with your needs and goals.

## 2. Booking Concierge
Go to the [booking-concierge](https://discord.com/channels/1211836675563589682/1240448219021053952) channel and click the ðŸ“© **Create ticket** button for personalized booking assistance. Provide your preferred practitioner and availability in the opened ticket.

Once we confirm practitioner availability, we will provide you with their session calendar so you can choose the best time for you.

## 3. Booking Confirmation
Upon booking, you will receive a confirmation email with all the necessary details. Payment is required upon booking and will be processed securely.

## 4. Prepare for Your Session
Ensure you have a quiet, comfortable space for your session and any materials you might need.

## Important Notes:
- **Off-Platform Bookings:** All bookings must be made through this channel. Off-platform bookings / DMs are prohibited to keep the platform running and growing!
- **Cancellation Policy:** Please review our cancellation policy in the `faq` channel.
- **Need Help?** If you encounter any issues or have questions, visit the `help-desk` channel for personalized assistance.

author: PsycheVoyage
text:
# Cancellation and Refund Policy

## Notification Window
Cancellations made 48 hours or more before the scheduled session incur no charges.
Cancellations made less than 48 hours before the scheduled session, or no-shows, will be charged the full session fee.

## Rescheduling
Sessions can be rescheduled up to 48 hours in advance without penalty.
Rescheduling within 48 hours is at the practitioner's discretion.

## Refunds
Refunds will be processed based on the above timelines and credited back to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.

## Exceptions
For emergencies or unforeseen circumstances, contact us in the [help-desk](https://discord.com/channels/1211836675563589682/1240449850156515418) channel. Exceptions to cancellation fees may be made on a case-by-case basis.

author: PsycheVoyage
text: Go to the [practitioner-profiles](https://discord.com/channels/1211836675563589682/1240448693530792006) channel to learn about the profiles of our expert practitioners. When you are ready to schedule a session, head over to the [booking-concierge](https://discord.com/channels/1211836675563589682/1240448219021053952) channel to request a booking time that works for you!

author: PsycheVoyage
text:
# Become a PsycheVoyage Practitioner

## Initial Application
Please DM <@PsycheVoyage> to express your interest and set up an initial call.

## Initial Call
During the call, we will discuss your background, qualifications, and what you can offer to the PsycheVoyage community.
We will also answer any questions you may have about the platform and booking process.

## Next Steps
If selected, we will guide you through the onboarding process, including setting up your profile, availability, and payment details.

## Join Our Practitioner Community
After approval, you will be invited to our private practitioners' channels for support and resources.

author: PsycheVoyage
text:
# Insurance and Payment Information

We do not accept insurance; all services are self-paid. By using our services, you accept full financial responsibility for any charges incurred.

## Steps to Determine Insurance Coverage

### 1. Contact Your Insurance Provider
Determine if the service is covered and to what extent.

### 2. Out-of-Network Benefits
Inquire about out-of-network benefits and the reimbursement process.

### 3. Documentation
You will receive a receipt after your session, which may be needed to submit a claim.

### 4. Submit a Claim
Submit the necessary documentation to your insurance provider.

### 5. Wait for Reimbursement
Your insurance provider will inform you about the reimbursement status and any required actions.
